name: Hack & Run
description:
Hack & Run is a 3d stealth game where you hack terminals and try to escape before the enemies catch you. 

You the player have no way to fight back, so you must hide from the enemies light and make sure that they do not catch you.

Originally made for GMTK2018 Jam, but we are going to put more time into it, and release it with more content, polish, and bug fixes.

-----------------------------------------

Art by Snarkfowl:  Twitter, Itch.io

Programming by TheAffronted: Twitter

Music by:

Mangled in Thought A - TeknoAXE
